doc.name: Repeat
doc.description: An actor that repeats a block of input tokens the specified number of times on the output. On each firing, it reads blockSize tokens and repeats each block numberOfTimes times on the output. Note that this causes a sample rate increase by a factor of numberOfTimes, and hence affects the number of invocations of downstream actors. If the input does not have enough tokens, then this actor does nothing. If blockSize or numberOfTimes is zero, then it produces no outputs.
doc.author: Shankar Rao, Steve Neuendorffer
doc.property: The repetition factor. It is of type integer and has a default value of 2. It must be greater than zero.
The number of tokens in a block. It is of type integer and has a default value of 1. It must be greater than zero.
